name: Individual Investigations in Drawing
description: Students explore the use of drawing to investigate contemporary approaches to the production of artwork. Students work with a variety of traditional and unconventional drawing materials and processes to develop a professional website portfolio. Students participate in peer critiques, and write reflective essays and artist statements. [144P]
prerequisites: FAS343Y5 or FAS349Y5 or FAS359Y5 or FAS369Y5, 1.5 credits in FAH/VCC and P.I.
